alert.note: Alert for Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Martin Parish through 630 PM CDT... At 554 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Catahoula. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Catahoula, Breaux Bridge, St. Martinville, Henderson, Cecilia, Atchafalaya Welcome Center and Parks. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 112 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
